oxcgrt 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

Description

oxcgrt

An Interface to the Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker API

Retrieve

get_json_actions()

Get JSON for policy actions data for a specific country for a specific date

get_json_time()

Get JSON for stringency index data over time

get_data_actions()

Get policy actions and stringency data from JSON

get_data_time()

Get time series stringency index data from JSON

Calculate

calculate_containment_health()

Calculate containment and health index

calculate_economic_support()

Calculate economic support index

calculate_gov_response()

Calculate government response index

calculate_index()

Calculate an OxCGRT index

calculate_indices()

Calculate OxCGRT index or indices

calculate_stringency()

Calculate stringency index

calculate_subindex()

Calculate sub-index score for a single indicator

calculate_subindices()

Calculate sub-index scores for all indicators
